item.title: My Python Dev Env setup
item.description: Making a note to jot down the tools I preferred to use when setting up Python development environment – there should be one– and preferably only one –obvious way to do things Terminal/REPL/IDE zsh/oh-my-zsh https://ohmyz.sh/ plugins=(git history-substring-search zsh-autosuggestions) theme: power10k Cheatsheet iTerm2 iPython/bpython VsCode Python environment management Managing virtualenv â€” virtualenv/virtualenvwrapper or venv manages virtual environments for a specific Python version. Managing multiple Python versions With pyenv
